TopicTitle: I think i discovered a "subspecies" of Kraken

Articles.Content:
sadly I don't have any screenshotsof this I will upload some soon

So when the game was loading up a plane in flight mode, reentry flames filled up my screen, but only for a split second.

This is very similar to the a55 kraken, but does not affect gameplay.

Yeah, they show up sometimes during load and revert screens, but did it cause a problem? I'm unsure what "killed my screen" means.

Cheers,

-Claw
Yeah, that happens to everyone. Also, if I was looking at the CoL then the loading screen would be a CoL and a black background. Same thing with CoT and CoW. It's just a slight nuisance.
